reviews.review_msg: I still have nightmares about my experience years later.  If you see Carl coming your way, RUN in the other direction!!!

Tried really hard to like Carl, but he's so scattered and incomprehensible. Will also avoid you if you 'pester' him for constructive feedback. Grading system nonsensicial and many students took their concerns to the dept.
absolutely a genius!  I have never met a man with such intelligence and shine.  By far the best prof SFU will ever have.  I have never learned so much in my entire life
he's a very skilled associational thinker, as the plethora of overlapping, multicoloured, rotating overheads (most of which involved william s. burroughs and a shotgun) would indicate.  curious.
Carl is amazing and his class changed my life
